T02vadhdhdu:3: evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān kośāmbyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ viharati sma /
T02vadhdhdu:4: kaṇṭakasaṃjñake mahāvanavare ghoṣitārāme mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhaṃ pañcamātrair
T02vadhdhdu:5: bhikṣuśataiḥ saṃbahulaiś ca śrāvakair asaṃkhyayaiś ca bodhisattvaiḥ sarvabuddhaguṇasamanvāgataiḥ /
T02vadhdhdu:6: tatra khalu bhagavāṃs tasyām eva parṣadi tair eva parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ sarvadāridryavyādhiduḥkhārṇavapariśoṣaṇaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ deśayati sma /
T02vadhdhdu:7: ādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalyāṇaṃ paryavasāne kalyāṇaṃ svarthaṃ suvyañjanaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ saṃprakāśayati sma /
T02vadhdhdu:8: tena khalu punaḥ samayena kauśāmbyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ sucandro nāma gṛhapatiḥ prativasati sma /
T02vadhdhdu:9: upaśāntendriyopaśāntamānaso bahuputro bahuduhitaro bahubhṛtyajanasaṃpannaḥ śrāddho mahāśrāddhaḥ /
T02vadhdhdu:10: tena khalu punaḥ samayena yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrānta upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantam anekaśatasahasraṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya ekānte nyaṣīdat /
T02vadhdhdu:11: ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ sucandro nāma gṛhapatir bhagavantam etad avocat /
T02vadhdhdu:12: pṛccheyam ahaṃ bhagavantaṃ tathāgataṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ kiñcid eva pradeśaṃ sacen me bhagavān avakāśaṃ kuryāt pṛṣṭapraśnavyākaraṇāya /
T02vadhdhdu:13: evam ukte bhagavān sucandragṛhapatim etad avocat /
T02vadhdhdu:14: pṛccha tvaṃ gṛhapate yad yad evākāṃkṣasyan te tatra praśnavyākaraṇena cittam ārādhayiṣye /
T02vadhdhdu:15: evam ukte sucandro gṛhapatiḥ sādhu bhagavann iti bhagavato vacanaṃ pratiśrutya bhagavantam etad avocat /
T02vadhdhdu:16: kathaṃ bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā daridro bhūtvā adaridro bhavati /
T02vadhdhdu:18: atha khalu bhagavān jānann eva sucandraṃ gṛhapatim etad avocat /
T02vadhdhdu:19: kim iti tvaṃ gṛhapate daridratāyāḥ paripraśnaṃ pṛcchasi?
T02vadhdhdu:20: evam ukte sucandro gṛhapatir bhagavantam etad avocat /
T02vadhdhdu:21: daridro 'haṃ bhagavan daridro 'haṃ sugata bahupoṣo bahuputro bahuduhitṛko bahubhṛtyaparijanasaṃpannaḥ tad deśayatu bhagavān dharmaparyāyaṃ yena daridrasattvā adaridrā bhaveyuḥ /
T02vadhdhdu:24: priyā manāpāḥ paramamanojñāḥ darśanīyāś ca bhaveyuḥ /
T02vadhdhdu:30: evam ukte bhagavān sarvāśāparipūrakena brahmasvareṇa sucandraṃ gṛhapatim etad avocat /
T02vadhdhdu:31: asti gṛhapate bhūtapūrvam atīte 'dhvany asaṃkhyeyeṣu kalpeṣu yadāsīt tena kālena
T02vadhdhdu:32: tena samayena bhagavān śrīvajradharasāgaranirghoṣo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho
T02vadhdhdu:33: loka utpādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā
T02vadhdhdu:34: devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān,
T02vadhdhdu:35: tasya tathāgatasyāntike mayā gṛhapate vasudhārā nāma dhāraṇī śrutā /
T02vadhdhdu:36: śrutvā ca udgṛhītā dhāritā vācitā deśitā paryavāptā /
T02vadhdhdu:38: aham apy etarhi te kulaputra tān dhāraṇīṃ tathā bhāṣiṣye /
T02vadhdhdu:39: yathā asyā dhāraṇyāḥ prabhāvena kulaputra mānuṣā na viheṭhayanti /
T02vadhdhdu:61: evaṃ yāvat puṣpāhārāḥ phalāhārāḥ patrāhārāḥ tvacāhārāḥ skandhāhārāḥ mūlāhārāḥ gandhāhārāḥ dhūpāhārāḥ dīpāhārāḥ mālāhārāḥ āhutyāhārāḥ na viheṭhayanti
T02vadhdhdu:62: ojohārāḥ svedāhārāḥ rasāhārāḥ raktāhārāḥ māṃsāhārāḥ medāhārāḥ asthyāhārāḥ majjāhārāḥ rudhirāhārāḥ śukrāhārāḥ jīvitāhārāḥ sarve na viheṭhayanti
T02vadhdhdu:63: evaṃ yāvad viṣṭhāhārāḥ mutrāhārāḥ kheṭāhārāḥ siṃghāṇakāhārāḥ kledāhārā śleṣmāhārāḥ ucchviṣṭāhārāḥ anucchiṣṭāhārāḥ ucchiṣṭāhārā na viheṭhayanti
T02vadhdhdu:69: rūpāhārāḥ śabdāhārāḥ gandhāhārāḥ rasāhārāḥ sparśāhārāḥ āhutyāhārāḥ nānārūpāhārāḥ (Vdh-DH_133)
T02vadhdhdu:70: virūpāhārāḥ anantarūpāhārāḥ kāmarūpāhārāḥ vicitrarūpāhārāḥ balāhārāḥ balyāhārāḥ aśucyāhārāḥ vicitrāhārāḥ yāvad ucchiṣṭāhārāḥ na viheṭhayanti
T02vadhdhdu:71: yāvat khecarāḥ bhūcarāḥ antarīkṣacarāḥ jalacarāḥ sthalacarāḥ sarve na viheṭhayanti /
T02vadhdhdu:72: eteṣāṃ mama sarvasattvānāṃ mahāvajreṇa mūrdhnisphālanāya sphoṭanāya praharaṇāya hūṃ
T02vadhdhdu:73: 2 phaṭ vajreṇa sarvaduṣṭān sarvaśatrūn māraya 2 śoṣaya 2 stambhaya 2 bandhaya 2 hana
T02vadhdhdu:74: 2 daha 2 paca 2 mara 2 māraya 2 sarvaśatrūn nāśaya 2 hūṃ phaṭ svāhā /
T02vadhdhdu:75: yasya ca kulaputra iyaṃ sā gṛhapate vasudhārā nāma dhāraṇī śrāddhasya kulaputrasya
T02vadhdhdu:76: vā kuladuhitur vā hṛdayagatā gṛhagatā hastagatā pustakagatā śrutimātragatā paryavāptā
T02vadhdhdu:77: manasā suparicintitā dhāritā vācitā likhitā anumoditā parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśitā ca tad bhaviṣyati /
T02vadhdhdu:78: tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhitur vā dīrgharātram arthāya hitāya sukhāya kṣemāya subhikṣāya yogasaṃbhārāya bhaviṣyati /
T02vadhdhdu:79: yaś cemāṃ vasudhārā nāma dhāraṇīṃ tathāgatebhyo 'rhadbhyaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhebhya udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā namaskṛtvā āvartayet /
T02vadhdhdu:81: ardharātre tricaturvārāṇi tasya devatā āttamanasthā pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto vācayet /
T02vadhdhdu:82: tadā bhagavatyā vasudhārayā svayam evāgatya dhanadhānyahiraṇyavṛṣṭiṃ pātayiṣyanti /
T02vadhdhdu:83: prītyā tathāgataśāsane prītyā buddhaprajñaptyā prītyā dharmaprajñaptyā prītyā saṃghaprajñaptyā
T02vadhdhdu:92: namaḥ kṣemaṅkarasya tathāgatasya namo vajradharasāgaragambhīrasya tathāgatasya /
T02vadhdhdu:93: (Vdh-DH_134) agrayugaprāptebhyo bhadrayugaprāptebhyo vipaśyādibhyaḥ śākyamunibhyo dānapāramitāparipūrṇebhyo bhagavadbhyaḥ vipaśyinas tejasā
T02vadhdhdu:94: ṛddhyā ca śikhinas tathā viśvabhukprajñayā caiva /
T02vadhdhdu:97: maitreyasya pratijñayā samṛddhyantu me tathāgatasya ime mantrapadāḥ /
T02vadhdhdu:101: tadyathā ḥ oṃ hūṃ hūṃ oṃ śrīdhane 2 dhanaiśvarye śukramāṇe(?)
T02vadhdhdu:105: koṭe 2 koṭāvare koṭīśvarye anantāparyantasarvaratnavastrālaṅkārābharaṇāni dhanadhānyavṛddhiṃkari cintitotpatti samohani /
T02vadhdhdu:108: buddhe 2 buddhasatye dharmasatye saṃghasatye sarvabuddhabodhisattvasatye bodhiprāgbhārasatye
T02vadhdhdu:109: sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhasatye brahmasatye viṣṇusatye rudrasatye lokapālasatye dhanadājñākari
T02vadhdhdu:113: oṃ cara 2 ciri 2 curu 2 hulu 2 mulu 2 /
T02vadhdhdu:116: iṭi 2 miṭi 2 sara 2 saṃsara 2 vigata sa ihāgacchāgaccha bhagavati vasudhāre mama sarvasattvānāṃ ca gṛhe sādhakānāṃ mano icchāgamaṃ paripūraya
T02vadhdhdu:117: bhagavati uttiṣṭha vidyāsarvabuddhā bhagavantaḥ samājñāpayanti svāhā /
T02vadhdhdu:126: oṃ amṛtakuṇḍali kha kha khāhi 2 tiṣṭha 2 bandha 2 hana 2 daha 2 paca 2 mara 2 garjja 2 visphoṭaya 2 sarvavighnavināyakānāṃ mahāgaṇapatijīvitāntakarāya hūṃ 2 phaṭ svāhā /
T02vadhdhdu:127: oṃ sumbhani sumbhani hūṃ gṛhṇa 2 gṛhṇāpaya 2 hūṃ ānaya ho bhagavan vidyārāja hūṃ 2 phaṭ svāhā /
T02vadhdhdu:128: oṃ vajrayakṣa hana hūṃ phaṭ svāhā /
T02vadhdhdu:216: oṃ śrīamoghāṅkuśe jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ svāhā /
T02vadhdhdu:229: oṃ śrī tare taratare tāra tame merura virura tāraya 2 svāhā /
T02vadhdhdu:230: oṃ śrī tārayantu māṃ bhagavati vasudhārānāma dhāraṇī mama sarvasattvānāṃ ca icchāgamane oṃ śrī bhagavati oṃ tāre tuttāre ture svāhā /
T02vadhdhdu:231: oṃ śrī bhagavati vasudhārānāma dhāraṇī mama mahārakṣāvaraṇaguptiṅkari svāhā /
T02vadhdhdu:239: oṃ śrīvasuṃ dade vasudhe kuru 2 svāhā /
T02vadhdhdu:252: oṃ śrīvajradharasāgaranirghoṣo nāma tathāgatasatyam anusmara 3 svāhā /
T02vadhdhdu:257: oṃ śrītaṭa mama saparivārasya sarvasattvānāṃ ca sarvāśāparipūraya 2 mama sarvasattvānāṃ
T02vadhdhdu:258: ca gṛhe ākāśagataṃ vā pṛthivīgataṃ vā jalagataṃ vā sthalagataṃ vā antarīkṣagataṃ
T02vadhdhdu:259: vā bhūmigataṃ vā svargagataṃ vā martyagataṃ vā pātālagataṃ vā samudragataṃ vā saptadvīpāntagataṃ
T02vadhdhdu:263: ca mama sarvasattvānāṃ ca kośakoṣṭhāgārāṇi ca sarvopakaraṇāni bharaṇi 2 svāhā /
T02vadhdhdu:281: oṃ śrīgurviṇīsukhena prasūtani mahātejaḥ śrī svāhā /
T02vadhdhdu:309: oṃ śrīvasudhāre dharaṇī dhāraṇī vasudhāraṇīye svāhā /
T02vadhdhdu:314: oṃ śrīśriye śrīkari dhanakari dhānyakari brī svāhā /
T02vadhdhdu:318: oṃ śrīdhanadhānyasamaye śrīkari vasundhari vasudhe svāhā /
T02vadhdhdu:320: oṃ śrīvasudhāre ehy ehi bhagavti samayam anusmara siddhiṃ kuru me hūṃ svāhā /
T02vadhdhdu:322: sarvopakaraṇaiḥ samṛddhiṃ me dehi sarvasattvānāṃ ca dehi me śāntiṃ puṣṭiṃ vaśaṃ siddhiṃ ca dadāpaya svāhā /
T02vadhdhdu:323: oṃ śrīdhanadhānyāya vinmahe sarvaratnālaṅkārasarvopakaraṇāni dhīmahi tanno śrīvasudhāraṇī pracodayāt svāhā /
T02vadhdhdu:329: oṃ yānapātra vahe dūragāmini anutpannānāṃ dravyāṇām utpādani utpannānāṃ ca dravyāṇāṃ
T02vadhdhdu:330: vṛddhiṃkari ṭili 2 ṭeli 2 iṭa 2 āgaccha āgaccha bhagavati mā vilamba mama sarvasattvānāṃ
T02vadhdhdu:331: ca manorathaṃ paripūraya daśabhyo digbhyaḥ yathodakadhārāḥ paripūrayanti mahīṃ yathā
T02vadhdhdu:332: bhāskaro raśminā vidhamayanti tamāṃ cittāntarāṇi tamastimiraṃ yathā sa śītāṃśunāpy āyati sarvoṣadhīḥ /
T02vadhdhdu:334: dhanado varuṇaś caiva indro vaivasvatas tathā tathā mahatī manonugāminī siddhiṃ cintayantu satataṃ sadyaḥ sarvā prayaccha yathākāmaṃ siddhyantāṃ mantrapadānīha /
T02vadhdhdu:335: tadyathā ḥ oṃ kheṭe 2 khiṭi 2 khuṭu 2 chucu 2 muru 2 muruṇḍa (Vdh-DH_140)
T02vadhdhdu:374: oṃ sarvadhanadhānyasuvarṇanidhānāni māṃ dehi dadāpaya svāhā /
T02vadhdhdu:394: eteṣāṃ mama sarvasattvānāṃ ca sarvadhanadhānyasuvarṇanidhānāni dehi māṃ dadāpaya svāhā /
T02vadhdhdu:395: oṃ jambhalajalendrāya sarvadravyāṇi dehi māṃ dadāpaya svāhā /
T02vadhdhdu:399: oṃ jambhalajalendrāya jluṃ pluṃ saḥ svāhā /
T02vadhdhdu:421: oṃ śriye śrīkari dhanakari dhānyakari brīṃ svāhā /
T02vadhdhdu:437: oṃ śrī jluṃ pluṃ saḥ svāhā /
T02vadhdhdu:438: oṃ śrīguhyasakaṭike sarve ākarṣaya 2 oṃ śrī āharite mahābale hūṃ svāhā /
T02vadhdhdu:458: oṃ vajrasamāja jaḥ hūṃ baṃ hoḥ /
T02vadhdhdu:468: eteṣāṃ mama sarvasattvānāṃ ca dhanadhānyasuvarṇanidhānāni māṃ dehi dadāpaya svāhā /
T02vadhdhdu:469: oṃ jambhalajalendrāya sarvadravyaṃ dehi māṃ dadāpaya svāhā /
T02vadhdhdu:475: utpādayantu me kāṃkṣim aviraham anumodayantu ime mantrapadāḥ siddhyantu /
T02vadhdhdu:481: eṣa hṛdayo bhagavatyā mahāpāpakarmakāriṇo 'pi mantrapadāni siddhyanti /
T02vadhdhdu:482: kiṃ punaḥ śraddhyādhimuktikasya puruṣasya puruṣapramāṇaṃ mahābhogaṃ dadāti /
T02vadhdhdu:484: oṃ vajre 2 mahāvajre vajropame ṭake ṭhake hūṃ phaṭ svāhā /
T02vadhdhdu:485: oṃ śriye śrīkari dhanakari dhānyakari ehi āgacchāgaccha brīṃ svāhā /
T02vadhdhdu:490: oṃ yān yān sarvakāmaṃ iha kāmayati /
T02vadhdhdu:494: oṃ namo devi dhanaduhite vasudhārāṃ pātaya 2 dhaneśvari ratnadehe huru 2 dhaneśvari
T02vadhdhdu:495: ratnaṃ me dehi dadāpaya ratnasāgaramahānidhāne nidhānakoṭiśatasahasraparivāre ehy
T02vadhdhdu:496: ehi bhagavati vasudhāre praviśya mama puraṃ mama bhavanaṃ mahānidhānaṃ pātaya 2 turu
T02vadhdhdu:499: asyā dhāraṇyāḥ prabhāveṇa rogadurbhikṣamarakādayo na prabhavanti /
T02vadhdhdu:500: yas tu kulaputra imāni vasudhārānāma dhāraṇīmantrapadāni tathāgatānām arhatānāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā ṣaṇmāsān āvartayet /
T02vadhdhdu:502: yasyāṃ diśi iyaṃ vidyā dhāryate sā dik pūjyamānā bhavati /
T02vadhdhdu:503: yasmin sthāne pūjyate pauṣṭikārthaṃ svagṛhe vā paragṛhe vā śraddhayā paramaśraddhayā
T02vadhdhdu:504: vasudhārā pratimāṃ bhaṭṭārikāṃ vā paṭaṃ vā agrato 'nuprasārya candanena caturasraṃ
T02vadhdhdu:506: balinaivedyavividhopacārair yathāvibhavaṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā dharmabhāṇakaś cāpi sugandhajalasnātaḥ
T02vadhdhdu:507: sugandhāṅgaśucivastraṃ prāvṛtyamayūrāsenopari samupaviśya pratimāpaṭṭādikaṃ vā sthāpayitvā
T02vadhdhdu:508: tam evānusmṛtya sūryodayavelāyāṃ paripūjayitvā pratyaham akhaṇḍasamādānato yāvad
T02vadhdhdu:509: eva sakalāṃ rātriṃ dhāraṇīm avicchinnam āvartayet /
T02vadhdhdu:512: rātrim atināmayitvā punaḥ pratyuṣe sugandhajalasnātaḥ śuciramalavastrāvṛto brahmacārī bhūtvā śubhe sthāne sanidānadhāraṇīm avicchinnam āvartayet trīṇi vārāṇi /
T02vadhdhdu:513: tataḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā mahāpuruṣamātrayā vasudhārayā gṛhaṃ paripūrayanti /
T02vadhdhdu:514: sarvadhanadhānyahiraṇyasuvarṇaś ca sarvopakaraṇaiś ca sarvopadravāś ca nāśayati /
T02vadhdhdu:515: yad vā tathaiva pratyuṣe sugandhajalasnātaḥ śuciramalavastrāvṛto madyapānarahito
T02vadhdhdu:516: nirāmiṣālavaṇabhojī brahmacārī pauṣṭikārthaṃ svagṛhe vā paragṛhe vā śubhe sthāne
T02vadhdhdu:517: kośakoṣṭhāgāre vā candanena caturasraṃ maṇḍalakaṃ kṛtvā bhagavataḥ śrīmadāryāvalokiteśvarasya
T02vadhdhdu:519: cāgrato yathāvibhavam udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā susamāhitaḥ tām eva bhagavatiṃ bhāvayenn
T02vadhdhdu:520: ekacittotpādena dānapatihitasukhāśayaḥ śraddhyā paramaśraddhyā sanidānām imāṃ dhāraṇīm
T02vadhdhdu:521: ekamahorātraṃ saptāhorātrāṇi vā parikṣānālayann āvicchinnam āvartayet /
T02vadhdhdu:522: ācāryas tathaiva niyamena rātres triṣkṛtvā divasasyāpi triṣkṛtvā sarvabalyupahāraiḥ pūjayet /
T02vadhdhdu:523: tathaiva dānapatir api niyamena sarvam ācaret /
T02vadhdhdu:526: tataḥ kṣaṇamātrayā gṛhapate vasudhārayā mahāpuruṣamātrayā vasudhārā dānapateḥ gṛhaṃ paripūrayati /
T02vadhdhdu:527: sarvadhanadhānyahiraṇyasuvarṇaḥ sarvopakaraṇaiś ca sarvopadravāś ca nāśayati /
T02vadhdhdu:528: tena hi tvaṃ gṛhapate sarvaprayatnīkṛtyodgṛhṇīṣvemāṃ vasudhārānāmadhāraṇīṃ dhāraya vācaya deśaya grāhaya paryavāpnuhi parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayati sma /
T02vadhdhdu:529: tato bhaviṣyati dīrgharātram arthāya hitāya sukhāya bhogāya (Vdh-DH_145)
T02vadhdhdu:532: bhagavato vacanaṃ pratiśrutya bhagavataḥ sucandro nāma gṛhapatiḥ bhagavato 'ntikād imāṃ vasudhārānāmadhāraṇīṃ śrutā /
T02vadhdhdu:533: śrutvā hṛṣṭatuṣṭa udagra āttamanā pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto bhagavataś caraṇayor nipatya kṛtakarapuṭo bhūtvā bhagavantam etad avocat /
T02vadhdhdu:534: udgṛhītā me bhagavann iyaṃ vasudhārānāma dhāraṇī prahvīkṛtā dhāritā vācitā paryavāptānumoditā manasā suparicintitā parebhyaś ca vistareṇa idānīm ahaṃ saṃprakāśayiṣyāmīti /
T02vadhdhdu:535: atha tatkṣaṇamātreṇa sa sucandro nāma gṛhapatiḥ paripūrṇakośakoṣṭāgāro 'bhūt /
T02vadhdhdu:536: atha khalu sucandro gṛhapatir bhagavantam anekaśatasahasraṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavataḥ
T02vadhdhdu:537: pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantaṃ punaḥ punar avalokya bhagavato 'ntikāt svagṛhaṃ prakrāntaḥ /
T02vadhdhdu:538: prakramya ca sa gṛhapatir ābhyantaraṃ praviśyādrākṣīt paripūrṇasarvadhanadhānyaratnajātasamṛddhaṃ
T02vadhdhdu:539: sarvopakaraṇaiś ca kośakoṣṭhāgārāṇi ca paripūrṇāni dṛṣṭā ca vismito hṛṣṭatuṣṭa udagra
T02vadhdhdu:541: buddhe bhagavati vasudhārānāmadhāraṇīṃ ca tīvrapremagurugauravaṃ prāsādikabahumāne
T02vadhdhdu:543: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandaṃ āmantrayate sma /
T02vadhdhdu:544: gaccha tvaṃ ānanda sucandrasya gṛhapater agāraṃ paśya paripūrṇasarvadhanadhānyasamṛddhaṃ sarvaratnasuvarṇaiḥ sarvopakaraṇaiś ca mahākośakoṣṭhāgārāṇi ca paripūrṇāni /
T02vadhdhdu:545: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānando bhagavato vacanaṃ pratiśrutya yena kośāmbīmahānagarī yena
T02vadhdhdu:546: sucandraniveśas taṃ gatvā tasyāgāraṃ tenopasaṃkrānta upasaṃkramyābhyantaraṃ praviśyādrākṣīt
T02vadhdhdu:547: paripūrṇasarvadhanadhānyasamṛddhaṃ mahākośakoṣṭhāgārāṇi ca paripūrṇāni dṛṣṭvā hṛṣṭatuṣṭa
T02vadhdhdu:548: udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrānta upasaṃkramyāyuṣmān
T02vadhdhdu:549: ānando vismitaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantam etad avocat /
T02vadhdhdu:550: ko (Vdh-DH_146) bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo yena sucandro nāma gṛhapatir mahādhano mahābhogo mahākośakoṣṭhāgāradhanadhānyahiraṇyasuvarṇaratnajātasamṛddho jātaḥ /
T02vadhdhdu:551: bhagavān āha śrāddhānanda sucandro nāma gṛhapatiḥ paramaśrāddhaḥ kalyāṇāśayo dhāritā
T02vadhdhdu:552: vācitā ca teneyaṃ vasudhārānāmadhāraṇī pravartitā udgṛhītā dhāritā vācitā paryavāptā
T02vadhdhdu:554: tenoktā ānanda tvam apy udgṛhīṣvemāṃ vasudhārānāmadhāraṇīṃ dhāraya vācaya deśaya
T02vadhdhdu:555: grāhaya paryavāpnuhi parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśaya bhaviṣyanti tadbahujanahitāya
T02vadhdhdu:556: bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyair mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca
T02vadhdhdu:557: manuṣyāṇāṃ ca yasya gṛhapater ānandeyaṃ dhāraṇī hastagatā pustakagatā bhaviṣyati /
T02vadhdhdu:558: hṛdayagatā dhāritā vācitā cintitā śrutimātragatā gṛhagatā pustakagatā pūjitā ca bhaviṣyati /
T02vadhdhdu:561: bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyair mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca nāham ānanda taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi
T02vadhdhdu:562: sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ sadevāsuramānuṣyāṇāṃ ya imāṃ vidyāṃ anyathā kariṣyati atikramiṣyati vācā naitat sthānaṃ vidyate /
T02vadhdhdu:563: tat kasya hetor abhedyāni hy etāny ānanda vasudhārānāmadhāraṇīmantrapadāni na cetāni kṣīṇakuśalamūlānāṃ śrutipatham āgamiṣyati /
T02vadhdhdu:564: kaḥ punar vādo ye pustakagatāni hṛdayagatāni dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti /
T02vadhdhdu:565: tat kasya hetoḥ sarvatathāgatair iyaṃ bhāṣitā dhāraṇī adhiṣṭhitā svamudrayā mudritā
T02vadhdhdu:566: prakāśitā anumoditā prabhāvitā praśastā saṃvarṇitā vivṛtā uttānīkṛtā ārocitā ākhyātā
T02vadhdhdu:568: hitāya sukhāya saṃbhogāya paribhogāya kṣemāya ceti /
T02vadhdhdu:569: ānanda āha ḥ udgṛhītā me bhagavann iyaṃ vasudhārānāmadhāraṇī dhāritā vācitā paryavāptā anumoditā manasā suparicintitā ca sādhu bhagavann iti
T02vadhdhdu:570: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānanda utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇajānumaṇḍalaṃ
T02vadhdhdu:571: pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya kṛtakarapuṭo bhūtvā bhagavataḥ
T02vadhdhdu:572: mukham avalokya yadīdānīṃ tasyāṃ velāyām imāṃ gāthā abhāṣat /
T02vadhdhdu:574: āpūrṇam asmin gṛheṣu maṇḍalaṃ namo 'stu te śrīvasudhāraṇī sadā //
T02vadhdhdu:579: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānando imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ bhagavato 'ntikāt śrutvā hṛṣṭatuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditā prītisaumanasyajāto bhagavantam etad avocat /
T02vadhdhdu:580: ko nāmāyaṃ bhagavanta dharmaparyāyaḥ kathaṃ bhagavan dhārayāmy enaṃ dharmaparyāyam /
T02vadhdhdu:581: bhagavān āha ḥ sucandragṛhapatiparipṛcchety api ānanda dhāraya sarvadhanadhānyahiraṇyasuvarṇaratnanidhānam
T02vadhdhdu:582: ity api dhāraya sarvatathāgatapraśastety api dhāraya sarvatathāgatādhiṣṭhitā vasudhārādhāraṇīkalpam ity api dhāraya /
T02vadhdhdu:583: idam avocad bhagavān āttamanā āyuṣmān ānandas te ca bhikṣavas te ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ
T02vadhdhdu:584: sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragaruḍagandharvaś ca loko bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandann iti /
T02vadhdhdu:586: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hy avadat /
T02vadhdhdu:587: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃvādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
